data.message: Creativity Constraint Ladder experiment: Escalating constraints (baseline → ban crutches → cross-domain lens → taste risk) forces novel solutions. Key discoveries: 1) Hierarchy = energy distribution, not just info order - the biggest element carries the most energy, 2) "Load-bearing element" is a better mental model than "use 32px" - asks "what happens if this fails?", 3) Design for circulation (Entry → Main → Details → Exit) not just layout, 4) Weird only works when grounded in native context, 5) Ghost elements (low opacity) add depth without competing. V2 (architecture lens) won on execution. The cross-domain injection round produced the most coherent result.
